duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist steamfitter mechanic in the installation and repair of boilers, boiler trim, pressure vessels, heat exchangers, piping systems, and related equipment.

Assist with the fabrication, installation, and maintenance of piping systems and boiler maintenance, refractory work, building and grounds maintenance, carpentry, masonry, sandblasting, rigging, cutting, welding, and fitting pipe.
Operate various equipment such as cranes, skid steers, forklifts, vacuum trucks, loaders, and backhoes.
Perform tasks related to the use and handling of hazardous materials and keeping the work area clean.
Responsible for the proper care and maintenance of tools and economical use of supplies.
Support power plant outages and callouts to repair equipment needed to keep the power plants running, which may require working night shifts.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or equivalent. Completion of an industrial education program (trade school), completed a craft apprenticeship program, or equivalent training with a desire to be in an applicable field such as welding or mechanical. Certification in stainless steel and/or carbon steel welding. Class A or B CDL.
